content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you with your HVAC needs today? May I have your name to get us started?
Hi, this is Linda. My AC isn’t working right and it’s starting to get warm.
Thank you, Linda! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we’re able to help you in your area?
Great, 898 Willow Lane. Thank you! Can you tell me what ideal days or times work best for a technician to come take a look, or is it urgent?
It’s not urgent but maybe this weekend? Also, can you tell me how much it will cost before I decide?
Thanks for letting me know! I’ll check availability for this weekend. For HVAC service, I can provide a price estimate. Could you describe what’s wrong with your AC or any symptoms you’ve noticed?
It just blows warm air. I set the thermostat but it doesn’t get cool, and it’s making a weird noise.

Thanks for explaining, Linda! Based on what you described, typical diagnostic and repair visits for AC start at $129, plus the cost of any parts and additional labor if needed. Would you like to schedule an appointment for this weekend?
Oh wow, $129 just to look? That’s more than I can spend right now, sorry. I’ll see if I can figure it out on my own for now.
reason: Price too high for customer budget

content: I understand, Linda. If you have any questions or need help in the future, we’re always here for you. Have a great day and stay cool!
reason: Price too high for customer budget
